de.embl.rieslab.emu.configuration

Class ConfigurationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.embl.rieslab.emu.configuration.ConfigurationController

  • public class ConfigurationController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for the configuration of the current UI. This class bridges the SystemController with the ConfigurationWizardUI, the GlobalConfiguration. The ConfigurationController starts the configuration wizard to allow the user to modify the current configuration. It also contains inform the SystemController on the different configurations. Finally, it calls the ConfigurationIO to read and write the configurations from/to files.
    Author:
    Joran Deschamps

      • startWizard

        public boolean startWizard(java.lang.String pluginName,
                           ConfigurableFrame maininterface,
                           MMPropertiesRegistry mmproperties)
        Starts a new configuration wizard. If a wizard is already running, then does nothing and returns false.
        Parameters:
        pluginName - Current plugin's name.
        maininterface - plugin's ConfigurableFrame.
        mmproperties - Micro-manager properties.
        Returns:
        True if a new wizard was started, false if it was already running.

      • isWizardRunning

        public boolean isWizardRunning()
        Returns true if a ConfigurationWizard is running, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if a ConfigurationWizard is running, false otherwise

      • applyWizardSettings

        public void applyWizardSettings(java.lang.String configName,
                                java.lang.String pluginName,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> uiproperties,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> uiparameters,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> plugsettings,
                                java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> globset)
        Retrieves the pairs of UIProperty name and MMProperty names (and UIProperty state values), as well as the pairs of UIParameter names and values, and writes them to the configuration file. It then calls the SystemController to update the system. This method is called by the ConfigurationWizardUI upon saving of the configuration by the user.
        Parameters:
        configName - Name of the configuration.
        pluginName - Name of the current plugin.
        uiproperties - Mapping of the UIProperties with MMProperties and their states.
        uiparameters - Mapping of the UIParameters' states.
        plugsettings - Mapping of the Settings' states used to configure the ConfigurableMainFrame.
        globset - Mapping of the GlobalSettings' states.

        public boolean startManager()

        public boolean isManagerRunning()

        Returns:
        true if a ConfigurationManager is running, false otherwise
